data.text: @IG93595376 Hi Raja, we're rapidly expanding our network. We shall definitely look into the potential the option holds. Stay tuned with us for updates.

RT @Avileo87: There are some gestures which won your heart and remains embedded in your heart forever.
One of this gesture is done by @flys…

@Avileo87 Awesome, that's what we like to hear, Abhishek. We strive to provide an excellent customer service and appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback. Kindly DM us your PNR and advise the department so we may share your words with our team. https://t.co/Qi2laHRc1E
@SUHAIL_ARSHID Hi Suhail, please note, you may carry the trimmer in both cabin and check-in baggage.

@varunvats23 Hi Varun, please note, the check-in counter closes 60 mins prior to the flight departure. Passengers need to report before counter closure for a hassle free check -in and to avoid last minute no show.

@BlockAnalyst235 that is issued within the valid time frame, namely, 48 hours from the time of collecting the sample. <<

@BlockAnalyst235 a valid negative Covid-19 test report with a QR code, as issued from an ICMR or Pure Health approved laboratory. The report should be based on a molecular diagnostic test intended for the qualitative detection of nucleic acid for SARS-COV-2 viral RNA, >>
